title: Apocalipsis Z: The Rage of the Righteous
description: Zombie apocalypse survivors have a chance: they have been rescued in the ocean by one of the last remaining organized groups on Earth. Forced to accompany their rescuers, to the Gulf of Mexico, a place that seems to flourish under the leadership of a mysterious benevolent preacher. While in town everyone acts as if the apocalypse had never been unleashed, but they soon discover that something sinister lies beneath this paradise ...Caught in a whirlwind of ambition, conflicting groups, castes and religions struggling for supremacy, but always surrounded by an ocean of Undead, our protagonists try to do what they do best: Survive.
author: Manel Loureiro
